publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1137.2 Mr Alex Salmond: Amendment to Business Motion-As an amendment to motion (S1M-1137) in the name of Mr Tom McCabe, under Thursday 7 September 2000, delete "Stage 3 Debate on the Regulation of Investigatory Powers (Scotland) Bill", and insert "Debate on the Scottish Qualifications Authority and the crisis of year 2000 Higher and Standard Grade results". Supported by: Mr John Swinney*, Nicola Sturgeon*, Bruce Crawford*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Andrew Wilson*, Michael Matheson*, Michael Russell*, Tricia Marwick*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*
